detail: Lose 5 points if you are wrong!
Choose a team! They cannot buzz for the steal this turn.
Pick a team! They lose 5 points instantly.
Team gets one FREE re-try if the first answer is wrong.
Your team gets an immediate +5 points regardless of outcome.
The facilitators give a hint. They might mislead you!
You may swap your chosen question for ANY other
Pick another team! They score bonus points if you answer correctly
No floor steel allowed! The question dies if you miss
The team to your right chooses who answers on your team.
